title: Sajid Javid – 2020 Statement on ECOFIN
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the statement made by Sajid Javid, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, in the House of Commons on 21 January 2020.
content:
A meeting of the Economic and Financial Affairs (ECOFIN) Council will be held in Brussels on 21 January 2020. The Council will discuss the following:
